Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory180.png'}
{3: 'Kowloong Metropolis—96 hours until the arrival of the Ascendants and the other forces.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Lady Qu, why did you decline Luna's request?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu, I know I must hand you over to Luna—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '—But for a person like her, there is a difference in trust between me giving her something, and her taking something away.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Why must you destroy them? Isn't the end result the same for the both of you?"}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Not at all. We are destined to be at odds with each other. I wish to continue the human race, while she wishes to completely erase humanity's existence.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So when she uncovers the truth, she will try to stop the Tabula Akasha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Even with the city enshrouded, there's no guarantee that the ruins beneath the city will go unnoticed by Luna.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Therefore, it is paramount that we nip this in the bud and eliminate all that threatens the Tabula Akasha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'What about the people of Babylonia?'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'They shall serve as my pawns in the fight against the Ascendants until their very last breath.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'During which, we will be in Kowloong working behind the scenes, steadily working on implementing the Tabula Akasha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Understood. What do you require of me?'}

{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Backup the M.I.N.D. data for all of the Primes and Phecda in Kowloong, record all battlefield intel and maximize their memory data, then save everything onto the Tabula Akasha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Understood. Shall we inform the citizens?'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'No. The fewer who know, the better.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Roger.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'When people look up to the Sovereign, they see what they want to see.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But in fact, they only get what the Sovereign chooses to give.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Let me give them one last show before the curtain falls.', 4: '1'}
